thread.title: Tottenham star Erik Lamela ruled out for the rest of the season with hip injury
thread.title_full: Tottenham star Erik Lamela ruled out for the rest of the season with hip injury

author: Jim Daly
title: Tottenham star Erik Lamela ruled out for the rest of the season with hip injury
text:
Sport Tottenham star Erik Lamela ruled out for the rest of the season with hip injury The Argentina winger will undergo surgery on his hip on Saturday and will sit out the rest of the season as a result Share Erik Lamela is out for the rest of the season with a hp injury (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Tottenham have confirmed that Erik Lamela will undergo surgery on his hip, which means he will miss the rest of the season. 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
